title: Washer Dryer in Unit, Resort Style Swimming Pool, 24-hour Maintenance
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 104', 'OR Text', '104', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'This is a 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1211 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Capri North and South Apartments are a beautiful, pet-friendly community that offers one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'These spacious residences feature fireplaces, oversized garden tubs, large walk-in closets, washers and dryers and covered parking.', 'Take advantage of our community amenities by relaxing in our resort-style swimming pool or getting in a good workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center.', 'Capri North and South are conveniently located near I-95 and Sunset Park and is minutes away from McCarran International Airport, UNLV, and other dining and shopping areas.', 'Features:', 'Fully Equipped Kitchen, Walk in Closets, Digital Cable and Internet Included in Every Unit, Washer Dryer in Unit', 'Community Amenities:', 'Dog Park, 24-hour Maintenance, Flexible Lease Terms Available, Online Payments Accepted, BBQ grills, Pet Stations, WiFi Available, Business center, Gated Access, Resort Style Swimming Pool, Professional Management, Spa, Fitness Center', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'gAmg5068']
